thread.title: Texans' Ryan Mallett misses team flight, flies commercial
thread.title_full: Texans' Ryan Mallett misses team flight, flies commercial

title: Texans' Ryan Mallett misses team flight, flies commercial
text:
Texans’ Ryan Mallett misses team flight, flies commercial Resize Text By Cindy Boren October 25 at 1:05 PM Follow @cindyboren Ryan Mallett was on time for warmups. (Wilfredo Lee/Associated Press) 
Just because he isn’t starting, that doesn’t mean the Houston Texans don’t want Ryan Mallett on the sideline. 
The Texans’ quarterback missed the team’s charter flight to Miami for the game Sunday against the Dolphins but hopped on a commercial flight and will dress for the game, ESPN’s Tania Ganguli reports . 
Timing has been an issue for Mallett before. He missed a training camp practice days after Brian Hoyer was named the Week 1 starter. He said he had overslept and promised to buy a better alarm clock. Mallett stepped in to start when Hoyer struggled, going 1-3. 
Coach Bill O’Brien pulled Mallett in favor of Hoyer during the game against the Indianapolis Colts in Week 5 and Hoyer was the starter the following week. After spending most of her career in traditional print sports journalism, Cindy began blogging and tweeting, first as NFL/Redskins editor, and, since August 2010, at The Early Lead.
